text:
**TalkingArch** is a re-spin of the Arch Linux live ISO image, modified to include speech and Braille output for blind and visually-impaired users.
**Notable features**
- All the features of the Arch Linux, but adds speech and Braille packages to make it possible for blind and visually impaired users to install and use Arch Linux eyes-free.
**Available DEs**
- Cinnamon
- Deepin
- GNOME
- Enlightenment
- KDE
- LXDE
- MATE
- Xfce
**More info**
https://talkingarch.tk/
